@_dralaterdzo I was living in Toronto during the SARS epidemic.  I wasn’t allowed in Toronto General because of restrictions, while my daughter was in ICU. Worst time of my life.  We saw the career of doctors go out the windows when they succumbed to that horrid disease. I did go to SARSfest.
